text: "Because" is a song written by John Lennon (credited to Lennon/McCartney) and performed by The Beatles. It features a 3-part harmony vocal performance between Lennon, McCartney and George Harrison, overdubbed three times to make nine voices in all. "Because" appeared on the 1969 album Abbey Road. ==Other websites== * * * * * * Category:The Beatles songs Category:1969 songs
title: Because (Beatles song)
